content: Click the 3-bar menu icon in the upper right, Settings, Composition, HTML Style, uncheck the box "Use Paragraph...".
creator: sfhowes

content: Right-click any message tab, Close Other Tabs.
creator: sfhowes

content: The server must be smtp.office365.com, not smtp-mail.outlook.com. If you didn't have the correct server, change it, restart TB, and see if OAuth2 is an option. If not, there is a way to force it.
creator: sfhowes

content:
Hi,

"Settings/Calendar/Reminders? See picture."

Thanks.

I got to Settings/Calendar -- but not Reminders. I got to Reminder settings using Search. The attached picture helped.

These settings are for defaults. What about Reminder settings for individual tasks? Daily tasks can all be the same, but not individual ones (appointments), which I need to change as the appt. date gets closer. Is this possible in this calendar?

(Just an FYI .... the picture wasn't in the email; I don't know if it was supposed to be.)
creator: KJS-LES

content:
Se hai attivato l'autenticazione a 2 fattori devi creare una passowor apposta per Thunderbird -> https://guide.pec.it/posta-pec/gestione-account/password/come-generare-la-password-per-programma-di-posta.aspx

Altrimenti spiega in dettaglio il tuo problema.

p.s. Questo è solo un forum per gli utenti dei prodotti Mozilla, non è un supporto tecnico.
creator: @next
